column4: mrfeetio: what format is it in now?  do you have an iso?  is it a series of directories?  and fyi, just becuase it's burned to a dvd, there is no promise that a set top player will read it
mrfeetio: you have to convert those to vob.  you have a job ahead of you.  you need to google for guides bro
thx-1138: does that include info about transcoding?
he also needs to make a title set probably
